import { memo } from 'react'; import { DataTable } from 'primereact/datatable'; import { Column } from 'primereact/column'; function Modal(props) { const { detailOrder, handeModalUpdateStatus } = props; return (
Chi tiết đặt hàng

{ detailOrder.length > 0 && detailOrder[0].Status === '2' ? : ''}
) } export default memo(Modal); const styles = { bodyModal: { borderRadius: "10px", boxShadow: "5px 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)", padding: "20px" }, text : { fontFamily:"Times New Roman", fontWeight: 500 }, dataTable: {fontFamily:"Times New Roman"}, }
